attributes.action: all CBD oil legalised in hospitals specially children who are in desperate need
attributes.additional_details: CBD is one of 104 chemical compounds, known as cannabinoids, that can be found in the cannabis plant. It’s a naturally occurring substance, which can be extracted and mixed with a carrier oil – often hemp seed or coconut – to create CBD oil. It can help for seizures and epilepsy and cancer and depression and anxiety there’s loads of stuff it should be used for
attributes.background: Because there’s children in the community and in the hospital who desperately needs this to keep them alive and stop them from dieing and also being in a hell of a lot of pain so it will also benefit off ppl who suffer with anxiety and depression and most biggest killer is cancer
